text: You would not believe how often Ron Swanson and Leslie Knope appear in our internal mockups and test data for new functionality.
I LOVE that SO very much haha!
As a big fan of Gilmore Girls (I dont hide it) I too am always excited to see these pop up. We also occasionally see some Silicon Valley references and more come through. Its always fun
There are a lot of lil Easter eggs scattered throughout the docs.  I love it.
